Class StatStages

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAccuracy(int accuracy)
      Adds the given value to the pokemon's Accuracy stage The Accuracy stage ranges from -6 to 6 The value to be added can be negative
      void addAtk(int atk)
      Adds the given value to the pokemon's Attack stage The Attack stage ranges from -6 to 6 The value to be added can be negative
      void addDef(int def)
      Adds the given value to the pokemon's Defense stage The Defense stage ranges from -6 to 6 The value to be added can be negative
      void addEvasion(int evasion)
      Adds the given value to the pokemon's Evasion stage The Evasion stage ranges from -6 to 6 The value to be added can be negative
      void addSpatk(int spatk)
      Adds the given value to the pokemon's Special Attack stage The Special Attack stage ranges from -6 to 6 The value to be added can be negative
      void addSpd(int spd)
      Adds the given value to the pokemon's Speed stage The Speed stage ranges from -6 to 6 The value to be added can be negative
      void addSpdef(int spdef)
      Adds the given value to the pokemon's Special Defense stage The Special Defense stage ranges from -6 to 6 The value to be added can be negative
      boolean allStagesZero()
      Returns true if the pokemon's StatStages are all zero, false otherwise
      double getAccuracyModifier()
      Calculates and returns the Accuracy stat modifier (%)

      Returns the Accuracy stage

                  int spatk,
                  int spdef,
                  int spd,
                  int accuracy,
                  int evasion)
        Constructor of StatStages. Initializes all stat stages to the respective given values
        Parameters:
        atk - attack stage
        def - defense stage
        spatk - special attack stage
        spdef - special defense stage
        spd - speed stage
        accuracy - accuracy stage
        evasion - evasion stage
